data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Pop! Horror City Character Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Nurses, Doctors, EMTs and Rescue Workers - a city overrun by the living dead can never have too many and these fearless characters are ready to help clean up Horror City or die trying.

Made for use with the ever growing POP! art style, creator Vexed Enigma has brought to life (and un-death) a host of brand new characters themed around Medical and Rescue services, each with an extra alternative colour scheme for convenient variation. Featuring a variety of skin tones and body types, with full facesets, zombie versions and downed/dead poses, this character pack is perfect for spicing up your POP! Horror City creations!

Features:
  • Made for use with POP! Resources and formatted for use in RPG Maker VX-Ace and RPG Maker MV
  • 8 unique Medical & Rescue Characters with matching sprites and facesets, plus a colour variant for each
  • 20 faceset sheets featuring full emotion sets for each character plus zombie facesets
  • Zombie and downed/dead versions of each character, with non-gory versions included for the squeamish
  • Brand new POP! sprite and faceset bases included featuring plus size and elderly characters
  • 8 new "Power Up" objects themed around Medical & Rescue services including Blood Packs, Crowbars, Scalpels and more!

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
